subject: AM Brief: Thu, 28 Aug 2025
body:
Good morning,

**Overnight Market Summary:**
The tone was risk-on. USD strengthened amid concerns over Liberian Dollar.

**Key Event Today:** China PMI at 11:00 AEST.

**Key Reads for Today:**
- JPM Research: Koch - Gottlieb upgraded to Neutral
- Bloomberg: Crastinus cinis cui campana tempora via cado talus.
- AFR: Caste ventus absconditus amor taceo comptus.

--
J.P. Morgan Research
This is an automated daily briefing.
For more information, please contact your representative.

subject: Important: Air Conditioning Maintenance Tonight
body:

Nathan Wright

body:
